Default Linux kernel: By default Linux-libre, but the Debian Project also hosts a non-free repository allowing blobs to be installed optionally.[85] Built with Linux-libre tools.[89]

Install-time desktop environment or wind: GNOME (default Workstation Edition), Spins for: KDE Plasma Workspaces, Xfce, LXDE, MATE (with Compiz), Cinnamon, Sugar on a Stick
Awesome, Enlightenment, Fluxbox, GNOME, KDE, LXDE-Meta, Openbox, XBMC and Xfce (live DVD)[95]

Default Linux kernel: Debian Linux kernel, and (unlike Debian) blobs cannot be installed[89]

Install-time desktop environment or wind: GNOME, Xfce, Mate, Enlightenment, i3, ratpoison, xmonad
KDE Plasma Workspaces, GNOME, LXDE, Xfce, Enlightenment, Openbox

Default file system: Squashfs, ext2, ext3, ext4, FAT32, reiser, xfs
ext4, ext3, ext2, reiserfs, brtfs, xfs
Install-time desktop environment or wind: KDE, XFCE Fluxbox, Blackbox, fvwm2 twm
none - headless server by design; provides Webmin for administration

Default Linux kernel: Ututo XS (stable) is de-blobbed with Linux-libre tools.[115] Ututo UL (development) uses Linux-libre. Ututo UL means "Ubuntu-Libre"

Install-time desktop environment or wind: Install-time desktop environment or window manager selection
